questions.text: Kara returned to Krypton in the beginning of the episode.
questions.explanation:
False.

	She was in a dreamlike state caused by an alien plant that forced her to think she was back on Krypton. She was however still in her apartment. The plant was called the "black mercy" by the Kryptonians.

questions.text: Who imitated Kara at CatCo while she was incapacitated?
options: Wynn (with voice recording and other gadgets)
Lana Lang (with a mask and staying across the room from others)
questions.explanation:
The Martian Manhunter (with shapeshifting abilities).

	The Martian Manhunter struggled to keep up with Cat Grant as her assistant. Cat was rude and overbearing, but no more so than she normally was to Kara.The Martian Manhunter played Kara/Supergirl twice during the season, both times to fool Cat.

questions.text: How many hours late to work was "Kara"?
questions.explanation:
3.

	Though Kara technically never showed up, instead it was J'onn J'onzz (the Martian Manhunter) acting as her.  He then tried to ask for the day off and got yelled at for it.

questions.text: Who sent the bad creature to Kara's apartment?
questions.explanation:
Non.

	Non is Kara's uncle, but they are not friendly, they are fighting on opposite sides of a war on Earth. Non was married to Kara's aunt on Krypton before he was imprisoned and wound up on Earth when the prison ship crashed.

False.

	Once she made up her mind that she didn't want to be in the dream world that the parasite helped her to create, the creature simply detached itself from her body.

questions.text: Who showed up to help Supergirl fight the other Kryptonians?
questions.explanation:
Martian Manhunter.

	He revealed himself as a Martian to Astra and Non and helped her to defeat them both. Astra was a general in the Kryptonian army before she landed on Earth. During the fight, Supergirl fought Non, and The Martian Manhunter fought Astra.

Non.

	The quote was during a fight with Supergirl. The fight ended in a draw when Non flew off before letting Supergirl kill him.

questions.text: Who stabbed Astra with a Kryptonite sword?
questions.explanation:
Alex.

	The Martian Manhunter told Supergirl that he did it to protect Kara's feelings. Alex stabbed Astra to save Martian Manhunter from being killed during a fight.

questions.text: What was the name of the Kryptonian battle plan?
questions.explanation:
Myriad.

	Though exactly what the plan was wouldn't be revealed until later episodes. The plan was still brought forth after after Astra's death. Non took over as the leader of the Kryptonians on Earth.

questions.text: What relation was Astra to Supergirl?
questions.explanation:
Aunt.

	Astra was the twin sister of Kara's mother. Kara had unwittingly helped get Astra arrested when she was a child on Krypton. Astra stopped to visit with Kara and was taken into custody in their home after after Kara left the room. Astra had never forgiven Kara for being a part of that plan.
